text:
@SpeakerPelosi @WHO IT IS EVIDENT THAT TRUMP DOESN'T HAVE ANY SERIOUS CONCERN ABOUT THE SAFETY
AND WELL BEING OF THE AMERICAN PEOPLE , OUR ALLIES , AND ALL THE PEOPLE
THAT WILL BE EFFECTED BY HIS
RECKLESS DECISIONS . ESPECIALLY (W.H.O.) . TRUMP HAS SHOWN HIS IRRESPONSIBILITY FOR THE COVID19 PANDEMIC
